snippets.text: Just this {year}, a study found that living within a mile of a golf course more than doubles a person's odds of developing Parkinson's. One theory is that it is because golf courses use pesticides.
I'm known for my short {rehearsal} times: just six weeks. My last two weeks are famous among theater people because things move at a very high speed.

source.publication: The New York Times Style Magazine
source.author: Joshua Barone

snippets.text: Each loss is a reminder of the one that came before and a {rehearsal} for those yet to come.
The metaphors flowed freely in Janos Szasz's {rehearsal} room.
